channel.title: Rakov Škocjan on Martin's Blog

item.title: Rakov Škocjan
item.description: Rakov Škocjan Here is an example of an area I remember visiting as a child and have only vague recollections of it. It is a stunning area in the karst region of Slovenia - the same region where the world famous Postojna caves and Škocjan caves are located, however the Rakov Škocjan park albeit less known to the regular tourist, is still a must see. Rakov Škocjan
